TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NameScopePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class NameScopePropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class NameScopePropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定提供 XAML 名称范围值的关联类的属性。

span.span: Specifies a property of the associated class that provides the XAML namescope value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在使用 XAML 的典型对象模型/应用程序模型组合中，用作 XAML 名称范围的类是通常用作根元素或支持页比喻的类。In a typical object model / application model combination where XAML is used, the classes that are used as a XAML namescope are the classes that are generally used as root elements, or that support a page metaphor. 在框架的编程模型和应用程序模型的上下文中，通常通过典型的 xaml 处理行为，使用这些类来实现和创建 xaml 名称范围。These classes generally implement and the XAML namescope is created corresponding to the root by typical XAML processing behavior in context of a framework's programming model and application model. 如果 使用，则 XAML 名称范围属性值应为实现 并保存实际 XAML 名称范围及其行为的对象。If is used, the XAML namescope property value is expected to be an object that implements and holds the actual XAML namescope and its behavior. 此属性有两种形式：仅属性名称或类型和属性。There are two forms for this attribute: property name only, or type and property. 后一种形式应该只用于包含 XAML 名称作用域的属性是可附加成员。The latter form should be used only for cases where the property that holds the XAML name scope is an attachable member. 附加成员技术的优势在于，服务类可以实现可支持多种不同对象类型的 XAML 名称范围概念。The attached member technique has the advantage that service classes can implement a XAML namescope concept that can support several different object types. 然后，这些对象类型不需要在类继承中显式关联。Those object types then do not need to be explicitly related in class inheritance. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中，此类存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 WindowsBase 中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ， 为 system.exception 程序集。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 在 WPF 中，此特性仅应用于单个类型 。In WPF, this attribute is applied to only a single type, . 在这种情况下，属性化属性为服务类 及其 附加属性。In this case the attributed property is the service class and its attached property.

summary.span: 获取提供 XAML 命名空间的属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that provides the XAML namescope.

value.span: 一个字符串值，该值是提供 XAML 命名空间的属性的名称。

span.span: A string value that is the name of the property that provides the XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的意义 取决于是否 设置了。The meaning of depends on whether is set. 如果 为 null，则 引用正在属性化的类型的属性。If is null, then references a property on the type being attributed. 如果 包含一个值，则 引用所指示的上的一个属性 。If contains a value, then references a property on the indicated .

summary.span: 获取提供 XAML 命名空间支持的附加属性的所有者类型。

span.span: Gets the owner type of the attached property that provides the XAML namescope support.

value.span: 一个 ，它是提供 XAML 命名空间支持的附加属性的所有者类型；或者为 。

span.span: A value that is the owner type of the attached property that provides the XAML namescope support, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅适用于 XAML 名称范围实现属性为可附加成员的情况，在这种情况下，这是可附加成员的所有者类型。This property only is relevant if the XAML namescope implementing property is an attachable member, in which case this is the attachable member's owner type. 否则，此值可能为 null。Otherwise, this value may be null. 如果需要常规的基于反射的逻辑在所有情况下报告名称范围属性的定义类型，则可以在遇到此属性时替换应用该属性的类型 `null` 。If you need general reflection-based logic that reports a namescope property's defining type in all cases, then you can substitute the type where the attribute is applied whenever you encounter `null` for this property.
